verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:17
verses.text: So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:18
verses.text: And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed–edom, and Jeiel, the porters.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 15:19
verses.text: So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were appointed to sound with cymbals of brass;
